name: QueryPie
long_description:
QueryPie is the enterprise-ready solution for governing AI-powered access in modern data environments. With native Model Context Protocol (MCP) support and verified integrations with tools like Slack, GitHub, and AWS, QueryPie sets a new standard for secure, centralized access governance.
As a unified access governance platform based on Zero Trust principles, QueryPie enables organizations to manage and monitor access to databases, servers, Kubernetes clusters, and internal web applications with precision and ease.
Trusted by over 130 enterprises and fully compliant with global standards such as ISMS, PCI-DSS, and GDPR, QueryPie empowers organizations to build secure and scalable data access control frameworks.
With built-in support for AI infrastructure, QueryPie seamlessly connects large language models (LLMs), AI agents, and MCP servers through a centralized control layerâ€”ensuring that all automated workflows across SaaS tools, cloud environments, and internal systems remain secure, auditable, and compliant.
